sni-server-cert-check.help: Check the SNI in the client hello message with the CN or SAN fields in the returned server certificate.
sni-server-cert-check.name: sni-server-cert-check

options.help: Check the SNI in the client hello message with the CN or SAN fields in the returned server certificate. If mismatched, use the CN in the server certificate to do URL filtering.
options.name: enable

options.help: Check the SNI in the client hello message with the CN or SAN fields in the returned server certificate. If mismatched, close the connection.
options.name: strict

options.help: Do not check the SNI in the client hello message with the CN or SAN fields in the returned server certificate.
options.name: disable
